name: Swift 3 SF314-512-50XM OPI
description: The Swift 3 is part of Acer's Swift line of laptops, which are designed to be thinner and lighter than typical laptops. The Swift 3 SF314-512-50XM OPI is 15.90 mm high, 321 mm wide, 210.8 mm deep, and weighs about 1.5 kg.
display: 35.6 cm (14') display with IPS (In-Plane Switching) technology

name: A515-56G-579G P.SILVER core I5
description: The Acer Aspire 5 A515-56G-579G P.SILVER core i5 is a pure silver notebook that measures 36.34 cm x 23.85 cm x 1.795 cm and weighs 1.9 kg.

name: Aspire Vero AV15-51R-5822
description: Acer Aspire Vero is an affordable, eco-friendly laptop that has enough battery life to last most of the day. However, PCWorld says that the laptop's 3D performance is only good enough for older titles and simpler indie games.

name: Swift 3 SF314-43-R06N
description: The Swift 3 is part of Acer's Swift series, which are designed to be thinner and lighter than typical laptops. It has a slim, all-metal chassis and a long-lasting battery.

name: Aspire Vero AV15-51-78G8
description: The Acer Aspire Vero AV15-51-78G8 is a 15.6-inch laptop with a 16:9 aspect ratio and 45% NTSC color gamut. It has a quad-core processor, 16 GB of standard memory, and a 1 TB NVMe SSD.

name: Zenbook Pro Duo 15 OLED
description: ZenBook Pro Duo 15 OLED lets you get things done in style: calmly, efficiently, and with zero fuss. It’s your powerful and elegant next-level companion for on-the-go productivity and creativity, featuring an amazing 4K OLED HDR touchscreen.

name: ASUS Vivobook Pro 14X OLED
description: Let the no-compromise Vivobook Pro 14X OLED unleash your creative power! You’ll enjoy effortless performance from its 12th Gen Intel® Core™ H-series processors and NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 3050 Ti GPU.

name: ASUS Chromebook CX1
description: Description for Product 1

name: ASUS Vivobook 14X OLED
description: Set your imagination free with the powerful Vivobook 14X OLED! Whether it’s for creative work or gaming fun, its 13th Gen Intel® Core™ H-series processor and NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 3050 Laptop GPU.

name: ProArt Studiobook Pro 16 OLED
description: The new ProArt Studiobook Pro 16 OLED is a powerful mobile workstation that exceeds all expectations and goes far beyond the extraordinary. Its unstoppable 13th Gen Intel® Core™ i9-13980HX processor, pro-grade NVIDIA RTX™ 3000 Ada Generation Laptop GPU.

name: XPS 15 Laptop
description: Bring your ideas to life with the XPS 15. The 16:10 4-sided InfinityEdge OLED display delivers brilliance that makes your creation as vivid as your imagination.

name: XPS 17 Laptop
description: 17-inch laptop loaded with power. Featuring up to 13th Gen Intel® Core™ processors, up to NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4070 graphics and a studio-quality display.

name: ALIENWARE X16 Gaming Laptop
description: Elevate your style and get used to stares with the new, head-turning Legend 3 design, AlienFX lighting and full metal parts that ensures - win or lose - you'll draw attention.

name: ALIENWARE M18 Gaming Laptop
description: Play like a boss with a high-powered, 18-inch gaming laptop that features advanced Alienware Cryo-tech™ cooling, 13th Gen Intel® Core™ processors and NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 40 Series graphics.

name: XPS 13 Plus Laptop
description: Bring ideas to life at a blistering pace with our most powerful 13″ laptop—featuring 12th Gen Intel® Core™ processors and innovative, modern design.

name: IdeaPad Slim 3i
description: The IdeaPad Slim 3i Gen 8 laptop is engineered with military-grade quality and is ideal for on-the-go work, school, or entertainment. Powered by up to 13th Gen Intel® Core™ processors, this 14″ lightweight device boasts speedy responsiveness for all your apps.
storage: 512 GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe Gen4 QLC

name: IdeaPad 1
description: Have fun on the IdeaPad 1 Gen 7 (15' AMD) as you watch shows on an expansive up to 15.6' FHD display with a razor-thin frame. Listen to rich audio from stereo Dolby Audio™ speakers.

name: ThinkPad E16 AMD G1
description: The Lenovo ThinkPad E16 (16″ AMD) laptop is powerful, reliable, and secure—perfect for your business needs. Tackle all of your jobs and enjoy peak productivity with the power of AMD Ryzen™ 7000 Series processors and integrated UMA graphics.

name: ThinkPad L14 AMD G4
description: Running on up to Windows 11 Pro, with AMD Ryzen™ 7000 PRO Series Mobile Processors and integrated AMD Radeon™ graphics, the Lenovo ThinkPad L14 Gen 4 business laptop has all you need to work from anywhere.

name: Lenovo ThinkBook ThinkBook 16
description: Want a laptop that's big on performance and easy on the eyes? The Lenovo ThinkBook 16 Gen 6 has got you covered. It boasts next-gen AMD Ryzen™ 7000 Series processors and integrated AMD Radeon™ graphics, so you can handle graphics-intensive tasks and heavy workloads with ease.

name: MSI GF63 THIN 11UC -1467PH
description: NVIDIA GeForce® RTX™ Laptop GPUs offer a step up in performance for gamers and creators. Experience lifelike virtual worlds with ray tracing and higher frame rates with AI-powered DLSS.

name: MSI MODERN 14 B7M -275PH
description: Power your passion with performance that keeps up with your dynamic lifestyle. Whether you are exploring campus life or pursuing your career, the Modern Series, equipped with up to AMD Ryzen™ 7 5825U Processor.

name: MSI BRAVO 15 C7UCX -248PH
description: Pick up your Bravo 15, join the thunderbird and adventurer on a journey to explore the mystical fantasy world!

name: MSI GF63 THIN 12UC -1000PH
description: Up to the latest 12th Core™ i7-12650H processor, the Thin GF63 provides an unprecedented boost in your multitasking projects and performance-demanding games.

name: MSI KATANA GF66 12UC -1007PH
description: Katana GF series is as powerful and sturdy as a blade and optimized to unleash true performance during gameplay. Katana GF66 runs at the optimum performance with exclusive red illumination keyboard so that you can shine on the battlefield.
